TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartDisplayModeEventHandler(object sender, WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartDisplayModeEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebPartDisplayModeEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs)
public delegate void WebPartDisplayModeEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs ^ e);
type WebPartDisplayModeEventHandler = delegate of obj * WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理 对象的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将调用委托中指定的方法 。The method specified in the delegate will be called when a event is raised. 页面开发人员可以通过将 `OnDisplayModeChanged` 属性添加到 `` 页面中的元素，并为属性分配自定义方法名称，为 Web 部件事件提供自定义处理程序。Page developers can provide custom handlers for Web Part events by adding an `OnDisplayModeChanged` attribute to the `` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute. 还可以通过编程方式分配自定义处理程序。A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically. 有关如何订阅事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何：引发和使用事件](/dotnet/standard/events/how-to-raise-and-consume-events)。For more information about how to subscribe to an event, see [How to: Raise and Consume Events](/dotnet/standard/events/how-to-raise-and-consume-events).
